scripts.build:ios-debug: cd Example/testHotUpdate && yarn && detox build --configuration ios.sim.debug
scripts.build:ios-release: cd Example/testHotUpdate && yarn && detox build --configuration ios.sim.release
scripts.test:ios-release: cd Example/testHotUpdate && yarn detox test --configuration ios.sim.release
scripts.build:android-debug: cd Example/testHotUpdate && yarn && detox build --configuration android.emu.debug
scripts.build:android-release: cd Example/testHotUpdate && yarn && detox build --configuration android.emu.release
scripts.test:android-release: cd Example/testHotUpdate && yarn detox test --configuration android.emu.release --headless --record-logs all
scripts.test:android-debug: cd Example/testHotUpdate && detox test --configuration android.emu.debug --headless --record-logs all
scripts.e2e:ios: npm run build:ios-release && npm run test:ios-release
scripts.e2e:android: npm run build:android-release && npm run test:android-release
scripts.tests:packager:jet-ci: cd Example/testHotUpdate && cross-env TMPDIR=$HOME/.metro REACT_DEBUGGER="echo nope" node_modules/.bin/react-native start --no-interactive
